Reviews.Title: “Value for the money”
Reviews.Author: Candace M
Reviews.Content: clean hotel decent location located near arc de triomphe subway near bit expected price lighting pretty bad day housekeeping added lamps bed nightstand shower bad head kept moving half shower door floor counter sink soaked 4th floor agree bit noisy didnt night morning internet free breakfast pretty fridge stocked water didnt plan purchasing anyway didnt contact hit misses hotel regence inexpensive paris

Reviews.Title: “Value for money, excellent location!”

Reviews.Content: la regence etoile ave carnot 3star conveniently located hotel carnot streets makeup etoile arc de triomphe air france bus stops street route 2 cdg hotel meters walk stop super convenient travelers suitcases clean charming bathrooms clean hair dryer complete breakfast served basement level worth price staff friendly couple convenience stores till late meters hotel restaurant street gem breakfast late night weekends metro station short walk hotel highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Luxury in Paris!”
Reviews.Author: mel_warren1
Reviews.Content: price little spend quickly realised avoid cigarette burns beds bad odours lots hotels looked 100 australian night unsanitary hotel regence etoile incredibly clean friendly helpful kept keys desk didnt loose happy direction fun amazing bathroom lovely bright sparkling clean beautiful bed lighting tv fridge snacks buy happy stock own food didnt eat plus stroll arch de triumphe subway ball

Reviews.Title: “Yes, value for money”
Reviews.Author: juhahi
Reviews.Content: nice hotel location clean fresh comfortable friendly staff free internet else negative soundproofing noises heard bit easily woke twice decided shower middle night definitely worth recommending

Reviews.Title: “Decent little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Pathon79
Reviews.Content: wife recently travelled paris weekend stayed hotel excellent location friendly staff clean comfy breakfast service regrets choosing hotel easy reach cdg airport taking air france transport bus line 2 stops nearby 2 3 minutes walk hotel paris lovely city enjoyed moment time apart day arrival wallet lost stolen left cash cards day eye wallet valuables times appears paris infamous pickpocketing culture barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Paris Hotel for anybody - especially first timers to Paris”

Reviews.Content: joined trip advisor review hotel 3 nights paris mom teenage daughter picked hotel metro literally outside door arch triumph hill entrance hotel hotel lovely quiet street block hustle bustle avenue des champs elysées 3 beds hard paris perfect clean hot shower free wifi staffi cant helpful willing help copy map directions travelling personthe airport bus outside door 15 euros nice bus directly airport 3 taxi 45 euros people option hesitate booking hotel hope am fortunate return someday husband girlfriends stay fantastic paris hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location and Room. Would stay again”

Reviews.Title: “Don't hesitate: BOOK!”
Reviews.Author: FrenchGlobetrotter
Reviews.Content: lived paris due return business trip convenient location short trip booked regence etoile reading tripadvisor reviews disappointed pros location location location ideally located subway stations 5 min walk champs elysee quiet street perfect night sleep size hotel hotel staff free speed internet value money cons boutique hotel swimming pool gym etc wont im definitively booking hotel trip paris

Reviews.Title: “Great location, quiet hotel with all amenities and very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: cherylmax
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights late november 401 twin beds bed settee surprisingly comfortable plenty towels loads hot water fridge nice hotel 3 star 4 bit tired decor front local makes clean arc de triomphe metro stop restaurant le hide round corner book advance booked day dont hotel call taxi time ripped taxi rank road instead

Reviews.Title: “A well located and good base for your stay in Paris.”
